title: Is streaming a future of gaming? - Quora

response.answer_text: YES. Undoubtedly, streaming has emerged as a pivotal fragment of the global video games market. As the trend on online multiplayer games have surfaced the global scenario, it has augmented the scope of video game live streaming. Moreover, platforms such as Twitch and HitBox provide lucrative revenue models for streamers that further attracts participants in this industry. It is estimated that in eSports viewers spent 17.9 million hours watching video games streaming on platforms such as YouTube’s gaming channel or on Twitch in Q1 2018. Moreover, Newzoo, a market intelligence provider for video games and eSports has estimated that the video game streaming will be valued at $1.65 billion by 2021. The prime monetization tools will be sponsorships and advertising.
